alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 9:40PM CDT until July 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN NEWTON AND NORTHERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 940 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marion, or near Meridian, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Meridian and Meridian Station around 945 PM CDT. Marion around 950 PM CDT. Kewanee around 1015 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
